title: Bi-doped BaBiO3 (x = 0%, 5%, 10%, 15%, and 20%) perovskite oxides by a sol–gel method: comprehensive biological assessment and RhB photodegradation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7359-7370
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA06354B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wissam Bouchal, Faiçal Djani, Djamel Eddine Mazouzi, Rima Nour Elhouda Tiri, Soufiane Makhloufi, Chaker Laiadi, Arturo Martínez-Arias, Ayşenur Aygün, Fatih Sen
BaBiO3 (BBO) perovskite oxides were prepared with different amounts of Bi nitrates using the sol–gel method and their biological activities and photocatalytic activities against RhB dye were examined.
